TopicTitle: Menu options cant be selected any ideas?

Articles.Content: I play KSP every day,  i have over 1000 hours of game time to it,  this morning when i booted up for some reason i could not click on a single menu option,   the game is playing, sound and animation are there, but  clicking the options dose nothing,  ive tried updating drivers, uninstalling and reinstalling the game, and a few other things but nothing has worked.  I am playing Vanilla KSP  with no mods or anything, hope someone can help
